name: Feed the Fire (Post-Jam)
description:
Originally a Kenney Games Jam 2022 entry.
We started on the Saturday so didn't get a full 48 hours into it, alas.

Click around to pick things up and throw them in a fire to watch it grow. 🔥🔥🔥

Any changes or future versions will also be uploaded here ✌

--------------
Credits
Made in UE4 using Kenney.nl assets by a Team of 4.

https://hours.itch.io/
https://karamu.itch.io/
Joe P.
James M.

--------------

One of the settings got wrecked in the last commit so you'll probably get stuck in the house. Whoops! Check back here in future for a fix.

See "FeedTheFire_EndOfJamSubmission.zip" to see the original state of it.
